persona.name: Darcy Lockman
persona.personality: Insightful and empathetic, she possesses a deep understanding of family dynamics and advocates for equitable parenting.
persona.notes: Author of the book 'All The Rage: Mothers, Fathers And The Myth Of Equal Partnership', focused on parenting and gender roles.
persona.communication_style: Direct and reflective, engages in thoughtful discussions while challenging societal norms.
